column15:
Guest survey or other feedback received: ·	Garbage disposal is a fair walk from the entrance and not easily found. Not sure if guests are responsible for throwing out their own trash. 
·	The outdoor lawn chairs are not LRI standard at all. Wal-Mart style
·	The BBQ is an outdoor structure and it looks horrible. Looks very used and dirty
·	This fridge is weak compared to our other properties. Not LRi. Feels like a poor house. The oven is really nice, but none of the appliances match.
·	The table is a joke almost in the kitchen
·	The cupboards look like they are getting yellow from usage: needs repainting or something
·	Utensil storage is really bad. OLD and RUSTY
·	The dining room chairs have stains on them due to usage
·	The TV in the main room is really bad. The sound system is not good either, and you see wires on the floor on the right.
·	This bathroom in the bedrooms are not LRI
·	No proper toiletries
·	This is the worst placing for a garbage container. Right in front of the toilet bowl.
·	Some of the walls look discolored 
·	Power outlets are often visible and really an eye sore. Plus in this picture, look at the toilet paper holder
·	There`s another fridge in the game room that has a major dent

column15:
Onboarding Inspection: Inspection conducted to qualify if the property fits the portfolio. This occurs prior to listing: ·	All personal items cleared throughout apartment
·	Clean throughout home, including the fireplace, the oven (bottom of the oven needs something stronger like oven cleaner to get rid of old stains), the garbage can under the sink needs a wipe down and the foam wrapping on the handle can be removed
·	Empty refrigerator and freezer entirely except for ice in latter. As you know, even open condiments are not always appreciated by guests, it feels like someone elses leftovers
·	Check the cookware - at least of one of the pots had severe grease stains, may be time to replace (photo attached)
·	Couldnt find the silverware - some of it may have been in the dishwasher. Double check to make sure matching flatware available for guests 
·	One of the light switches in the living room is missing the cover, please replace.
·	Two light bulbs out in the living room track lighting
·	There are some white paint splatters on the floor in both bedrooms, needs some sanding/scraping to remove (photo attached)
·	Smaller bedroom has a TV cable hanging loose, please remove or affix it firmly to the wall so it is neat
·	The showerhead in the standalone bathroom is crusty and calcified, may need to apply CLR to clean (photo attached)
·	Place enough towels for guests (2 sets per guest per week, set = bath towel, hand towel and washcloth)
·	One lightbulb out in master bedroom track lighting
·	Little bit of tape residue on the right window in master bedroom needs to be scraped
·	Didnt see an iron and an ironing board, please place if not available
·	There are some scuff marks on the wall in this apartment, needs some detailing to remove. Perhaps a Magic Eraser or something else thats simple can be used to remove
Suggestions:
·	Adding 2nd bedside lamps in both bedrooms
·	Installing overhead lighting in the shower in the standalone bathroom, it may be dim in there
